title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Non renewable reserves and resources; renewable resources, Transformation of Energy. Solar Power: Solar processes and spectral composition of solar radiation; Radiation flux at the Earth’s surface. Solar collectors. Types and performance characteristics. Applications. Wind Power : Wind speed, conversion and converters; conversion to electrical power. Characteristics of wind power plant. Applications. Tidal Power: Wave characteristics. Conversion systems and their performance features. Application, Geothermal Power: Biological conversion of Energy
